Trade/Device Name(s): Kawasumi Multiple Sample Adapter with Pre-Attached Holder (MBCH)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Kawasumi Multiple Sample Adapter with Pre-Attached Holder (MBCH) used for sterile non-invasive transfer or collection of blood specimen via luer connection.
Indications for Use Summary: Sterile, non-invasive device used for connection with syringes or female luer system to transfer or collect blood specimen into blood collection tubes or blood culture bottles.
